detaileddescription.para: Title: P01001: Stock assessment of trevally in TRE 7

Principal Investigator: Adam Langley Researchers: Mark Maunder Nokome bentley Status: Completed Trophia was contracted by the New Zealand Ministry of Fisheries (MFish) to carry out a stock assessment for trevally ( Pseudocaranx dentex ) in TRE 7, including estimating biomass and sustainable yield.The specific objectives for this project were:

listitem.para: To update the standardised and unstandardised CPUE analyses for TRE 7.
To update the current TRE 7 stock assessment including estimating biomass and sustainable yield.

detaileddescription.para: This project was funded by the New Zealand Ministry of Fisheries Project TRE2001/02
Outputs that will soon be available from this site include :
Langley, A.D. (2002). Analysis of catch and effort data from the TRE 7 fishery. New Zealand Fisheries Assessment Report 2002/32. 28 p. Download file
Maunder, M.N.; Langley, A.D. (Submitted). Stock assessment of trevally (Pseudocaranx dentex) in the TRE 7 fishery. Final Research Report to Ministry of Fisheries for TRE2001/02.

Maunder, M.N.; Langley, A.D. (In Press).Integrating the standardization of catch-per-unit-of-effort into stock assessment models: testing a population dynamics model and using multiple data types. Fisheries Research.
